Functions
fza_fnc_targetingSetSightSelect
Description

Sets the player's seat's sight to the source specified - 0 is FCR - 1 is HMD - 2 is TADS - 3 is FXD

Parameters
_heli

The helicopter to act on

_sight

The sight ID

Returns

Nothing

Examples
[_heli, 0] call fza_fnc_targetingSetSightSelect
// The sigght is now 0 (FCR).
Author

mattysmith22
